name: RE-ENDURO
description:
A fan remake of one of my favorite games from the early 80s. Extra mode included!

JOY PAD STRONGLY recommended! 

Instructions-

Press and hold left or right to select game mode and press start (see controls below)

Controls:

Joypad- 

Steering- left right (left stick)

Accelerate/Brake - Left right triggers

Start- Bottom (A) button

Keyboard-

Left right- Q,A or Left Arrow, Right Arrow

Accelerate/ Brake- P, L or Up Arrow, Down Arrow

Start- SPACE

Classic Mode- Overtake the set number of cars in one day, target increases for each success

RE-Enduro Mode- As above, but chain together overtakes without crashing to score BIG!

Music by Nicole Marie T

nicolemakesmusic.wixsite.com/nicolemariet

Voices by Nick Jenkin
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9KQzKvQlUSU-gYQ3SRxF0Q
